mapper.insert: MERGE INTO KAPLA_CART USING dual ON (USER_NO =(select user_no from kapla_user where id=#{id})) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET QUANTITY = (SELECT QUANTITY FROM KAPLA_CART WHERE USER_NO = (select user_no from kapla_user where id=#{id}))+#{quantity} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN insert (cart_no, item_no, user_no, quantity) values (cart_no_seq.nextval, #{item_no}, (select user_no from kapla_user where id=#{id}), #{quantity})
